LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFiredGenetronDesc: Install wood-fueled furnaces that greatly improve the power output of the genetron core, but will change the generator to require wood to operate.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFiredGenetronDescExpanded: Install wood-fueled furnaces that greatly improve the power output of the genetron core, but will change the generator to require wood to operate.\n\nGenetron needs to operate uninterrupted for 3 days (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFueledGenetronDesc: Install an automated system for feeding the fuel, keeping the furnace at optimal output with less frequent fueling.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodFueledGenetronDescExpande: Install an automated system for feeding the fuel, keeping the furnace at optimal output with less frequent fueling.\n\nGenetron needs to burn 700 fuel (fuel burned at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodPoweredGenetronDesc: Install energy circulators that redirect excess heat back into the genetron core, amplifying power output with only a slight rise in fuel consumption.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodPoweredGenetronDescExpand: Install energy circulators that redirect excess heat back into the genetron core, amplifying power output with only a slight rise in fuel consumption.\n\nGenetron needs to burn 1500 fuel (fuel burned at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodBlastingGenetronDesc: Install large, adjustable internal cylinders that allow altering the burn rate of the core, adjusting the power generated to fit the needs of the colony.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallWoodBlastingGenetronDescExpan: Install large, adjustable internal cylinders that allow altering the burn rate of the core, adjusting the power generated to fit the needs of the colony.\n\nGenetron needs to operate uninterrupted for 30 days (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelPoweredGenetronDesc: Install a set of chemfuel-operated engines that power up the genetron core, providing large quantities of energy by burning chemfuel. The engines will need regular maintenance, and if they break down, will require genetron components to be replaced.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelPoweredGenetronDescEx: Install a set of chemfuel-operated engines that power up the genetron core, providing large quantities of energy by burning chemfuel. The engines will need regular maintenance, and if they break down, will require genetron components to be replaced.\n\nGenetron needs to operate at 200% using genetron tuning uninterrupted for 12 days. (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelPoweredGenetronDescNo: Install a set of chemfuel-operated engines that power up the genetron core, providing large quantities of energy by burning chemfuel. The engines will need regular maintenance, and if they break down, will require genetron components to be replaced.\n\nRequires Biofuel refining research to be completed.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelBoostedGenetronDesc: Install a hyperburn chamber to superheat the combustion process and extract maximum energy from each unit of fuel.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelBoostedGenetronDescEx: Install a hyperburn chamber to superheat the combustion process and extract maximum energy from each unit of fuel.\n\nGenetron overdrive needs to be active for 5 days. (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelChargedGenetronDesc: Install an adaptive fuel modulator to adjust fuel flow dynamically, matching power demands and optimizing fuel usage. This ensures extended runtime and peak efficiency without sacrificing energy output.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelChargedGenetronDescEx: Install an adaptive fuel modulator to adjust fuel flow dynamically, matching power demands and optimizing fuel usage. This ensures extended runtime and peak efficiency without sacrificing energy output.\n\nPower surge needs to be activated 3 times. (activations at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallChemfuelFortifiedGenetronDesc: Install an ignition stabilizer gizmo to ensure consistent and steady combustion, maintaining optimal power output and reducing fluctuations in fuel consumption. This upgrade enhances the generator's reliability and fuel efficiency. The stabilizer can be calibrated to permanently improve the power output.

Install an ignition stabilizer gizmo to ensure consistent and steady combustion, maintaining optimal power output and reducing fluctuations in fuel consumption. This upgrade enhances the generator's reliability and fuel efficiency. The stabilizer can be calibrated to permanently improve the power output.\n\nGenetron needs to burn 1000 fuel (fuel burned at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallGeothermalGenetronDesc: Exchange the genetron core to utilise exclusively the steam energy produced by the geothermal vent. Doing so will decrease the power output significantly, but will also remove any fuel need completely. Geothermal genetron core will require regular maintenance, but can be maintained by everyone and not just the genetron specialists.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallGeothermalGenetronDescNoResea: Exchange the genetron core to utilise exclusively the steam energy produced by the geothermal vent. Doing so will decrease the power output significantly, but will also remove any fuel need completely. Geothermal genetron core will require regular maintenance, but can be maintained by everyone and not just the genetron specialists.\n\nRequires Geothermal power research to be completed.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallGeothermalGenetronDescNoStudi: Exchange the genetron core to utilise exclusively the steam energy produced by the geothermal vent. Doing so will decrease the power output significantly, but will also remove any fuel need completely. Geothermal genetron core will require regular maintenance, but can be maintained by everyone and not just the genetron specialists.\n\nA colonist needs to study an ancient geothermal genetron somewhere in the world.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallSteamPoweredGenetronDesc: Install a thermal vent booster to enhance steam flow from geothermal vents, boosting the genetron’s power output during peak energy demands. This upgrade ensures higher efficiency and performance when needed most.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallSteamPoweredGenetronDescExpan: Install a thermal vent booster to enhance steam flow from geothermal vents, boosting the genetron’s power output during peak energy demands. This upgrade ensures higher efficiency and performance when needed most.\n\nGenetron needs to operate uninterrupted for 15 days (time at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_InstallThermalVentGenetronDesc: Install a set of pressure surge protectors that will prevent the genetron from ever reaching a critical breaking point, while also increasing the power output.
LanguageData.VQE_InstallThermalVentGenetronDescExpand: Install a set of pressure surge protectors that will prevent the genetron from ever reaching a critical breaking point, while also increasing the power output.\n\nSteam boost needs to be activated 3 times. (activations at the moment: {0})
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronOverdriveDesc: Put the genetron in a temporary 5 day overdrive mode. It will rapidly burn through fuel, generating significantly more energy. If at any point during the overdrive the fuel runs out, the generator will break down and require refurbishing with genetron components.
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronOverdriveDescExtended: Put the genetron in a temporary 5 day overdrive mode. It will rapidly burn through fuel, generating significantly more energy. If at any point during the overdrive the fuel runs out, the generator will break down and require refurbishing with genetron components.\n\Overdrive has a 30 day cooldown. It will be ready again in {0}
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronTuningDesc: Alter the fuel consumption to increase or decrease the power generated by the genetron.
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronFineTuningDesc: Alter the fuel consumption to increase or decrease the power generated by the genetron, and adjust generator maintenance wear to boost the power output.
LanguageData.VQE_PowerSurgeDesc: Instantly vaporize half of the remaining fuel in the genetron to create a surge of power, refilling the batteries at the cost of a significant 25% maintenance reduction of the genetron. Power surge will temporarily disable nearby electronics.
LanguageData.VQE_PowerSurgeDescExtended: nstantly vaporize half of the remaining fuel in the genetron to create a surge of power, refilling the batteries at the cost of a significant 25% maintenance reduction of the genetron. Power surge will temporarily disable nearby electronics.\n\nPower Surge has a 15 day cooldown. It will be ready again in {0}
LanguageData.VQE_PowerSurgeDescNoMaintenance: Power surge cannot be activated: Genetron maintenance is too low (below 30%).
LanguageData.VQE_CalibrateEfficiencyDesc: Set the genetron into a low-power mode to calibrate its efficiency. While the fuel consumption will not change in the low-power mode, upon completion of the calibration, the power output will permanently increase by 1%.
LanguageData.VQE_CalibrateEfficiencyDescExtended: Set the genetron into a low-power mode to calibrate its efficiency. While the fuel consumption will not change in the low-power mode, upon completion of the calibration, the power output will permanently increase by 1%.\n\nThe efficiency calibration has a 5 day cooldown. It will be ready again in {0}
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronSteamTuningDesc: Alter the pressure of the genetron, affecting the wear and tear of components and the power output.
LanguageData.VQE_GenetronSteamTuningMaintenance: set maintenance loss per day to: {0}%
LanguageData.VQE_SteamBoostDesc: Temporarily enhance the steam flow by activating internal steam pumps, increasing the power output of the genetron. The vent boosters will need to cool down for a period of time, preventing them from being used again until the temperature is optimal again.
LanguageData.VQE_SteamBoostDescExtended: Temporarily enhance the steam flow by activating internal steam pumps, increasing the power output of the genetron. The vent boosters will need to cool down for a period of time, preventing them from being used again until the temperature is optimal again.\n\nSteam boost has a 15 day cooldown. It will be ready again in {0}
LanguageData.VQE_NeedsStudy: {0} did not study an ancient genetron.
LanguageData.VQE_NeedsStudyGeothermal: {0} did not study an ancient geothermal genetron.
LanguageData.VQE_NeedsStudyGeneric: This colonist can't repair critical breakdowns, as they did not study an ancient genetron
LanguageData.VQE_Alert_LowMaintenance_Desc: Genetron requires maintenance. If no maintenance is performed, the genetron will critically break down.
LanguageData.VQE_Alert_CriticalMaintenance_Desc: Genetron requires urgent maintenance. If no maintenance is performed, the genetron will critically break down.
